data.title: Joseph Payne Brennan, Donald M. Grant
data.meta_description: West Kingston, Rhode Island: Donald M. Grant, Publisher, 1979 . Octavo, cloth. First edition. Limited to 250 numbered copies signed by Brennan and Grant. Cthulhu mythos fiction set in Providence during the first World Fantasy Convention in 1975. A Lucius Leffing story. A fine copy in fine dust jacket and slipcase. #125446
data.text:
Brennan, Joseph Payne and Donald M. Grant. ACT OF PROVIDENCE. West Kingston, Rhode Island: Donald M. Grant, Publisher, [1979]. Octavo, cloth. First edition. Limited to 250 numbered copies signed by Brennan and Grant. Cthulhu mythos fiction set in Providence during the first World Fantasy Convention in 1975. A Lucius Leffing story. A fine copy in fine dust jacket and slipcase. (#125446).

Price: $75.00
